reference:
rwm1984 is saved as a data frame.
Count models typically use docvis as response variable. 0 counts are included
title: rwm1984
description:
Description
German health registry for the year 1984.

parameters.hhninc: household yearly income in marks (in Marks)
parameters.docvis: number of visits to doctor during year (0-121)
parameters.hospvis: number of days in hospital during year (0-51)

format: A data frame with 3,874 observations on the following 17 variables.
